      Creates a LettuceSentinelConnection with a client for the supplied host and port and reuse existing ClientResources.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LettuceSentinelConnection

        public LettuceSentinelConnection(RedisNode sentinel)
        Creates a LettuceSentinelConnection with a dedicated client for a supplied RedisNode.
        参数:
        sentinel - The sentinel to connect to.

      • LettuceSentinelConnection

        public LettuceSentinelConnection(String host,
                                 int port)
        Creates a LettuceSentinelConnection with a client for the supplied host and port.
        参数:
        host - must not be null.
        port - sentinel port.

      • LettuceSentinelConnection

        public LettuceSentinelConnection(String host,
                                 int port,
                                 io.lettuce.core.resource.ClientResources clientResources)
        Creates a LettuceSentinelConnection with a client for the supplied host and port and reuse existing ClientResources.
        参数:
        host - must not be null.
        port - sentinel port.
        clientResources - must not be null.

      • LettuceSentinelConnection

        public LettuceSentinelConnection(io.lettuce.core.RedisClient redisClient)
        Creates a LettuceSentinelConnection using a supplied RedisClient.
        参数:
        redisClient - must not be null.

      • LettuceSentinelConnection

        protected LettuceSentinelConnection(io.lettuce.core.sentinel.api.StatefulRedisSentinelConnection<String,String> connection)
        Creates a LettuceSentinelConnection using a supplied redis connection.
        参数:
        connection - native Lettuce connection, must not be null

      • LettuceSentinelConnection

        public LettuceSentinelConnection(LettuceConnectionProvider connectionProvider)
        Creates a LettuceSentinelConnection using a LettuceConnectionProvider.
        参数:
        connectionProvider - must not be null.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • remove

        public void remove(NamedNode master)
        从接口复制的说明: RedisSentinelCommands
        Removes given master. The server will no longer be monitored and will no longer be returned by RedisSentinelCommands.masters().
        指定者:
        remove 在接口中 RedisSentinelCommands
        参数:
        master - must not be null.

      • remove

        public void remove(String masterName)
        参数:
        masterName -
        另请参阅:
        RedisSentinelCommands.remove(org.springframework.data.redis.connection.NamedNode)

      • monitor

        public void monitor(RedisServer server)
        从接口复制的说明: RedisSentinelCommands
        Tell sentinel to start monitoring a new master with the specified RedisNode.getName(), RedisNode.getHost(), RedisNode.getPort(), and RedisServer.getQuorum().
        指定者:
        monitor 在接口中 RedisSentinelCommands
        参数:
        server - must not be null.
